SELECT V.VHC_NO , DL4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND , DL5.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE , DL0.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER , DL1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND , DL3.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC , D.MAKER , D.DVC_ID , D.MNG_ID , DH.MODEL_NM FROM BM_VHC_INFO V LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON V.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST DH ON D.DVC_ID = DH.DVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER') DL0 ON D.MAKER = DL0.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND') DL1 ON D.DVC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'INST_LOC') DL3 ON D.INST_LOC = DL3.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'VHC_KIND') DL4 ON V.VHC_KIND = DL4.DL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'VHC_TYPE') DL5 ON V.VHC_TYPE = DL5.DL_CD
DH.MODEL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR V.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
GROUP BY DVC_ID ORDER BY VHC_NO
